titleInfo.title: Ext 351/45 'Persian Consul General in India - Request for permission to remit dollars from India to America.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the Government of India, External Affairs Department, HM Ambassador, Tehran, Lloyds Bank, and the Persian Consul General, India, regarding the Persian Consul General's request to send dollars from India to his son studying America. The correspondence includes the General's dispute of the Government of India, External Affairs Department's initial refusal to facilitate the remittance.
